name: JDStatusBarNotification
summary: Highly customizable & feature rich notifications displayed below the status bar. Swift ready!
description: Highly customizable & feature rich notifications displayed below the status bar. Customizable colors, fonts & animations. Supports notch and no-notch devices, landscape & portrait layouts and Drag-to-Dismiss. Can display a subtitle, an activity indicator, a progress bar & custom views out of the box. iOS 13+. Swift ready!
